title: Ajyari
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Japanese, Organic, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. 有機茶屋あじゃり, at 〒563-0058 大阪府池田市栄本町12-4シャンティ池田１階, is an organic restaurant, tea house, and food shop. Vegan bento lunch boxes upon reservation. Vegan lunch set upon request and vegan Japanese desserts. More vegan options if you call a day ahead. Usually uses fish broth (dashi) but not if you ask for a vegetarian or vegan meal. Otherwise does not use fish or meat. Owner understands veganism. Dinner (5-9pm) upon reservation until one day ahead. Sometimes closes early (14h30) on Monday. Sunday is tea house only.
